page.title: 19THE GOLF COURSE IN SINFIN.
page.content: When I play golf I always play on the practice and putting greens. You have to pay Â£1.00 to play on the practice and putting greens. The people who own the golf course are the council. It costs Â£3.00 to play on the main course and lots of people use it. I go on the golf course when I come home from school. There are 18 holes around the course and there is a club house at the end. You have to be over 18 to go in the club house. The golf course has a golf shop where you can buy golfing equipment. By Jason Watson.
